about_me.title: About me
about_me.description:
Hi, my name is Enea Guidi, but on the internet I go by hmny, I'm 23 and currently I'm living and working in San Marino.

 I'm really passionate about computer science and software engineering, my favorite topics are related to Compiler, Language Design and Static Analysis but I'm also exploring the blockchain and distributed system worlds.

 Even if I have not much experience under my belt (2+ years) I still had the opportunity to work with different technologies and frameworks such as: Typescript, Go, Next.js, Nest.js, SQL & NoSQL database, Docker and many others.

 I strive to always improve myself and learn new things and would love to receive feedback about my work.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description:
Here's you can find a list of my most recent Open Source projects.
 At the moment I'm experimenting with 3D rendering on the web (mainly with React, Spline & react-three-fiber).
 I'm also quite keen on other fields such as: Compiler & Interpreters, Blockchain & Smart Contract programming as well as Distributed Systems like IPFS, Ray or Erlang.
